turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you get me a non-fat sugar free vanilla latte from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 21st near Vanderbilt

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande please. And bring 2 Splendas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How should I pay for it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order it from my app account

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, looks like your balance is running low

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, I'll reload it later

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, it's ordered from the Starbucks on 21st and will be ready in 15-17 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It always says that but it's usually quicker

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Maybe but it's probably busy right now since it's lunch time

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is there parking near there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yep, a lot in the back

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, I need coffee badly right now

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, see you in a few

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: See ya
